description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Akimbo Paddles sends paddle games into the dual-stick era!  Control a paddle with each thumbstick, and push your dual-wielding skills to the next level.  Full game includes 24 levels and 4 different ball characteristics.  Also includes a bonus endurance mode.  Akimbo Paddles features 3 new tracks from "The Thorn and Tear."
